interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: AZURE Hyaluronic & Retinol Anti Aging Under Eye Pads- Moisturizing & Rejuvenating Eye Mask Patches - Reduces Fine Lines, Wrinkles, Dark Circles & Puffiness - Skin Care Made in Korea - 5 Pairs
Review Date: 2020/03/01
Store: Azure Cosmetics
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Azure Cosmetics', 'Item Form': 'Under eye Patch', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.5 x 1 x 6 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': '689513260202', 'UPC': '689513260202', 'Manufacturer': 'Just Solutions!'}
Review Text: Pretty straight forward. Come 2 to a sealed pouch. They are stacked in the pouch so they can be a little difficult to get apart and straightened out. No noticeable or standout scent to them. Apply smooth, nice that they have slits so you can shape it to your contour. They do a nice job refreshing and smoothing my eyes.
Review Title: Nice product. Smooths nicely.
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
MARLOWE. Essentials Kit for Men No. 202 | Gift Set with 9 Products, Toiletry Bag | Lotion, Shave, Wash, Soap, Pomade, Lip Balm | Simple & Effective MARLOWE. M BLEND {'Package Dimensions': '10.24 x 5.24 x 4.76 inches; 2.62 Pounds', 'UPC': '859984007822'} I am a fan of MARLOW products...I have several others not included in this set and all are great. I'll break down each product briefly below.

BAG: Very nice, basic black but well padded and holds it's shape. I basic in shape but I higher quality then usual.

SOAP: Great balsam/fir scent. Excellent balance of exfoliation and suds. Leaves body invigorated, soft and smelling great!

SHAVE: Has a tea scent, hint of some sort of alcohol. Builds into a creamy texture, not much sud but decent coverage. Does it's job. Finishes with a clean scent.

FACE WASH: Nice balsam/fir scent to it. A little goes a long way! Very slick, seems to not penetrate but wash the exterior of skin. Takes some work to wash off. Finishes with a green tea scent and refreshed.

FACE MOISTURIZER: Has a tea/alcohol scent at first...Goes on smooth. Dries fairly quickly, leaving a sweet green tea scent. Leaves face feeling soft not oily.

POMADE: Great scent, more cologne like. Goes on easy, not too tacky or slick. Does a decent job.

LIP BALM: Awesome balm!!! At first I thought it was an odd addition to the set. But man I love this balm. Goes on with a hint of sweet tea. Not waxy, not glossy, just a perfect balance that keeps lips moisturized. Great set...All you need in one bundle. Great gift for someone. AZURE Hyaluronic & Retinol Anti Aging Under Eye Pads- Moisturizing & Rejuvenating Eye Mask Patches - Reduces Fine Lines, Wrinkles, Dark Circles & Puffiness - Skin Care Made in Korea - 5 Pairs Azure Cosmetics {'Brand': 'Azure Cosmetics', 'Item Form': 'Under eye Patch', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.5 x 1 x 6 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': '689513260202', 'UPC': '689513260202', 'Manufacturer': 'Just Solutions!'} Pretty straight forward. Come 2 to a sealed pouch. They are stacked in the pouch so they can be a little difficult to get apart and straightened out. No noticeable or standout scent to them. Apply smooth, nice that they have slits so you can shape it to your contour. They do a nice job refreshing and smoothing my eyes. Nice product. Smooths nicely.
profile:
**User Preferences Summary:**

- **Brand Affinity**: Maintains a strong preference for MARLOWE products but has also shown interest in other reputable brands like Azure Cosmetics, indicating openness to exploring new quality options.
- **Product Types**: Continues to enjoy comprehensive grooming kits while now also incorporating targeted skincare solutions like under-eye masks, reflecting a desire for specialized treatments alongside all-in-one solutions.
- **Scent Preferences**: Still favors natural, fresh scents; however, recent activity includes smelling unscented products, which suggests a flexibility in scent preferences for functional benefits.
- **Quality Expectations**: Expects high-quality products, as evidenced by the interest in effective formulations and pleasant user experiences. The preference for well-designed products remains clear.
- **Experience Orientation**: Values the practicality of products and has expanded this focus to include specific benefits for the delicate eye area, such as moisturizing and skin rejuvenation.
- **Gift-Giving**: Considers grooming kits and specialized skincare items, like eye masks, as suitable gift options, reinforcing a belief in their universal appeal for personal care.

Overall, the user displays a consistent trend towards effective and quality grooming and skincare solutions, highlighting both personal use and gifting considerations, while remaining open to exploring new products that fit their functional and aesthetic standards.
